inputs.name: Input directory
inputs.description: Directory containing the files to process

inputs.name: Basename
inputs.description: Basename of the file to process in the input directory

inputs.name: State
inputs.description: Example: "A". EEG state to be analyzed. The program will look for existing analysis windows labelled as state 'A' (Eyes Closed)

inputs.name: Window length
inputs.description: Length of the analysis window in seconds

inputs.name: fmin
inputs.description: Low cut frequency for analysis. Example: "0.390625"

inputs.name: freqres
inputs.description: Fequency resolution for analysis. Example: "0.390625". The analysis will use a frequency band like this: fmin:freqres:fmax. The program will compare this interval with the interval that is obtained for the real frequency parameters of the signal and will match both of them

inputs.name: fmax
inputs.description: High cut frequency for analysis. Example: "19.11"

inputs.name: wbands
inputs.description: Broad Bands definition. A string representing a 5x2 matrix of real numbers, where rows are separated by ';' and columns by spaces. Example: "1.56 3.51; 3.9 7.41; 7.8 12.48; 12.87 19.11; 1.56 30"

inputs.name: Brain
inputs.description: Restricts the inverse solution to only gray matter. Otherwise, deep structure (basal ganglia) will be included in the grid

inputs.name: PG Apply
inputs.description: Substracts the Global Scale Factor (Geometric Power) from the EEG signal

inputs.name: Broad Band Spectral Model
inputs.description: Calculates the Broad Band Spectral Model.

inputs.name: Narrow Band Spectral Model
inputs.description: Calculates the Narrow Band Spectral Model.

inputs.name: Spectra
inputs.description: Calculates the Spectra at the EEG sources.

inputs.name: Broad Band Spectral Model Z values
inputs.description: Calculates the Broad Band Spectral Model Z values.

inputs.name: Narrow Band Spectral Model Z values
inputs.description: Calculates the Narrow Band Spectral Model Z values.

inputs.name: SSZ
inputs.description: Calculates the Sources Spectra Z values.

inputs.name: Correlations matrix
inputs.description: Calculates the correlations matrix bewteen all pairs of channels for each epoch.

inputs.name: Coherence matrix
inputs.description: Calculates the coherence matrix bewteen all pairs of channels for each frequency.

inputs.name: Phase difference matrix
inputs.description: Calculates the phase difference matrix bewteen all pairs of channels for each frequency.

inputs.name: Frequency domain correlations
inputs.description: Calculates  the frequency domain correlations bewteen all pairs of channels for each frequency and each epoch.

inputs.name: XYZ components
inputs.description: Stores the XYZ components of the solutions at the sources.

output-files.name: Output folder
output-files.description: A folder containing the output files and a copy of the input files.
